TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLink extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 一个控件，显示指向另一个网页的链接。

span.span: A control that displays a link to another Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件创建指向另一个网页的链接。Use the control to create a link to another Web page. 控件通常显示为属性指定的文本。 The control is typically displayed as text specified by the property. 它还可以显示为属性指定的图像。It can also be displayed as an image specified by the property. 如果同时设置了和属性, 则属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果图像不可用, 则显示属性中的文本。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 在支持工具提示功能的浏览器中, 属性还会成为工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在网页上创建链接到其他网页的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page that links to another Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法, 以使文本以粗体显示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text is displayed in a bold font. [!code-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorender.vb#2)] 以下 Web 窗体使用自定义服务器控件以粗体显示超链接。The following Web Form uses the custom server control to display a hyperlink with a bold font. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 通知控件某元素已经过分析，并将该元素添加到 控件。

span.span: Notifies the control that an element was parsed, and adds the element to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员在从类派生自定义控件时使用。This method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 如果输入对象是, 并且控件没有子控件, 则输入对象用于设置控件的属性。If the input object is a , and the control has no child controls, then the input object is used to set the property of the control. 否则, 将调用基类的方法, 并将指定的对象添加到集合中。Otherwise, the method of the base class is called and the specified object is added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法, 以便它始终将 text 属性设置为分析对象的 text 属性, 如果已分析的对象为, 则为空字符串。本来.The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 控件显示的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for the control.

value.span: 为 控件显示的图像的路径。

span.span: The path to the image to display for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示为文本或图像。The control can be displayed as text or an image. 使用属性指定要为控件显示的图像。 Use the property to specify an image to display for the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了和属性, 则属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果图像不可用, 则显示属性中的文本。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 在支持工具提示功能的浏览器中, 属性还会成为工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以指定要显示的图像的路径。The following example demonstrates how to set the property to specify the path to the image to display. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };
member this.SupportsDisabledAttribute : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为“disabled”。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0, 则为; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`, 则在禁用`disabled`控件时, ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`, 则在禁用`class`控件时, ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Property Target As String
public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 值必须以 a 到 z 的字母（不区分大小写）开头，但下表所列以下划线开头的特殊值除外。

span.span: Values must begin with a letter in the range of a through z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.

description.span: 将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。

span.span: Renders the content in a new window without frames.

description.span: 将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。

span.span: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.

description.span: 在搜索窗格中呈现内容。

span.span: Renders the content in the search pane.

description.span: 将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。

span.span: Renders the content in the frame with focus.

description.span: 将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。

span.span: Renders the content in the full window without frames.

para.span: 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 值。

span.span: Check your browser documentation to determine if the value is supported.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 目标值。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击控件时显示链接到的网页的框架或窗口。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when the control is clicked. 通过设置属性来指定网页。The Web page is specified by setting the property. 如果未设置此属性, 则在单击控件时, 将刷新带有焦点的浏览器或窗口。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现`target`为属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. XHTML `target` 1.1 文档`anchor`类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果的 呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1, 请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 创建可访问的网页时, 强烈建议你避免使用属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将属性设置为指定窗口或框架以显示与控件相关联的页面。The following example demonstrates how to set the property to specify the window or frame to display the page associated with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本标题。

The text caption for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示为文本或图像。The control can be displayed as text or an image. 使用属性指定为控件显示的文本。 Use the property to specify the text to display for the control. 如果同时设置了和属性, 则属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果图像不可用, 则显示属性中的文本。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 在支持工具提示功能的浏览器中, 属性还会成为工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定要为控件显示的文本。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Text Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Text Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
